entry.title: Friday night: Periods of light snow. Low minus 6.
entry.summary: Increasing cloudiness. Periods of light snow beginning this evening. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 6. Wind chill minus 9 overnight. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EDT Friday 31 March 2023

entry.title: Saturday: Snow mixed with rain. High plus 3.
entry.summary: Snow becoming mixed with rain late in the afternoon. Snowfall amount 10 cm. Wind southeast 20 km/h gusting to 40. High plus 3. Wind chill minus 9 in the morning. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EDT Friday 31 March 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: Snow mixed with rain. Low minus 20.
entry.summary: Snow ending before morning then cloudy. Snow mixed with rain early in the evening. Wind becoming northwest 30 km/h gusting to 60 in the evening. Low minus 20. Wind chill minus 29 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EDT Friday 31 March 2023
